scripts.dev: bun build --watch --target browser src/content/twitter.ts --outdir=dist/content && bun build --watch --target browser src/background/index.ts --outdir=dist/background && bun build --watch --target browser src/popup/popup.ts --outdir=dist/popup
scripts.build: bun build --target browser src/content/twitter.ts --outdir=dist/content && bun build --target browser src/background/index.ts --outdir=dist/background && bun build --target browser src/popup/popup.ts --outdir=dist/popup
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/icons && cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp -r public/icons/* dist/icons/ && touch dist/icons/icon16.png dist/icons/icon48.png dist/icons/icon128.png
